content.rendered:
Certified or Registered Medical Assistant | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time Monday-Friday, 8am-5pm
  • Must be able to give proof of RMA or CMA certification
  • Must have at least 1 year Medical Assisting experience in a physician office
  • EMR experience a plus
  • Experience with front and back office preferred
  • Must be proficient in phlebotomy and injections
  • $12/hour
